## 讀取資料
```{r}
library(readr)
lvr_prices <- read_csv("C:/Users/USER/Downloads/lvr_prices_mac.csv")
#View(lvr_prices)
```

## 使用na.rm 處理missing value
```{r}
a <- c(1,2,3,4,5,NA)
sum(a, na.rm=TRUE)
#?sum

mean(lvr_prices[lvr_prices$area == '大安區',]$total_price, na.rm=TRUE)
```

## 避免溢位, 使用as.numeric 轉型
```{r}
sum(as.numeric(lvr_prices[lvr_prices$area == '大安區', ]$total_price), na.rm=TRUE)
```

## 做資料排序
```{r}
sort(lvr_prices[lvr_prices$area == '中山區', ]$total_price, decreasing = TRUE)[1:3]

zhongshan <- lvr_prices[lvr_prices$area == '中山區', ]
zhongshan <- zhongshan[order(zhongshan$total_price, decreasing = TRUE)[1:3],]
zhongshan
```
